intro: Trachelium diffusum, commonly known as the spreading trachelium, is a flowering plant native to the Mediterranean region. It is a member of the Campanulaceae family, characterized by its bell-shaped flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or limestone soils and thrives in full sun. Its flowers are usually blue to purple in color, and it produces small, elongated fruits. Trachelium diffusum is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and landscapes.
